subject: CNN Alerts: bush

CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
S. Korea, U.S. agree on free trade

06/28/07 10:51 PM, EDT
South Korea and the United States have agreed on final changes to their free trade agreement, paving the way for its signing on June 30, the prime minister's office said Friday.
FULL STORY
